description: Coordinates sub-agents to provide comprehensive F1 fantasy team recommendations with calculated numeric values

drivers.name: Max Verstappen
drivers.reason: Locked driver. Top-performer with strong win record, dominant in qualifying and races.

drivers.name: Lewis Hamilton
drivers.reason: Locked driver. Consistent points scorer; Mercedes showing improvements.

drivers.name: Oscar Piastri
drivers.reason: Aggressive pick; McLaren's recent upgrades pushing Piastri into podium contention.

drivers.name: Yuki Tsunoda
drivers.reason: High-upside lower-cost pick; excels in chaotic, aggressive race scenarios.

drivers.name: Nico Hülkenberg
drivers.reason: Calculated risk; qualifies well and has shown point-scoring potential in unpredictable races.

alternative_picks.name: Charles Leclerc
alternative_picks.reason: Fast in qualifying, capable of podium in tight races.

alternative_picks.name: Lando Norris
alternative_picks.reason: Consistent podium threat with excellent late-race pace.

alternative_picks.name: Esteban Ocon
alternative_picks.reason: Can capitalize in aggressive strategies and wet/dynamic conditions.

insights.stats_summary: Verstappen has averaged 47.8 points over last 5 races; Hamilton trending upward. Piastri outscored Norris in 2 of last 3 events. Tsunoda strong in top 10 despite car limitations.
insights.prediction_highlights: Aggressive risk profile: Piastri and Tsunoda offer biggest high-reward potential based on qualifying and race chaos. Hülkenberg likely to capitalize on unpredictability.
insights.news_context: McLaren upgrades have closed pace gap; Mercedes introducing minor improvements for this round. RB team positive about Tsunoda's mindset and recent performance spike.
